Title: Reckoning
Writer: Joe Gayton (creator), Tony Gayton (creator), Jennifer Cecil, Tom Brady (story editor), Michael C. Martin (staff writer), Jimmy Mero (staff writer)
Actors: Anson Mount, Colm Meaney, Christopher Heyerdahl, Robin McLeavy
Plot: Cullen attempts to find a way for the railroad to pass over the mountains for Durant. As a Mormon, Naomi has her own struggles settling into Cheyenne. Brother Hatch continues to suspect the Swede of fraud and murder.
